properties.description: An old church being converted into a community space. There is a small kitchen, 1 accessible toilet, stage and space to meet.
properties.title: Barthol Chapel Community Hub

properties.address: Udny Community Trust Ltd, Ellon, Aberdeenshire AB41 7AG
properties.description: Everyone from the community is welcome to come in, use our comfy couch area and get cozy. We've got a sharing library with books and board games, and there's always someone around to have a natter with.
properties.title: The Medan Centre
